A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After first seeing it I would have given it a higher rating\, but then I started to think about it. So\, about 30-45 minutes of plot could have been completely removed with a couple of lines of dialogue between pink haired admiral and Poe\, but she gives him the same level of respect the Empirials give their subordinates\, so we get a bunch of useless stuff that makes everything worse. Also\, the Force has been turned into a magical sentience that\, more than ever\, just arranges things to happen\, this explanation given by Snoke as to why Rey is so unbelievably powerful. That is\, Kylo had become such a strong force user that the Light side had to create a champion to face him. I know that Star Wars always had a bit of chosen one syndrome\, but this is just beyond the pale. The gritty universe of Star Wars is now a Young Adult Novel\, chosen one special young people and all. You can keep it.
